column4: i got torrentflux, but i cant upload since linux wont let it save files in certain folders, how to change that?
anyone know?
change which folders are used in preferences.
you mean in torrentflux?
isnt is possible to give it access to dir /home/golgor/torrent?
yes, off course.
i got all the permissions, my user of course, but i still get error when try to upload torrent "no permission to create file /home/golgor/torrent
no, I mean, what permissions are set for the /golgor/torrent directory.
drwxr-xr-x
go chmod o+w /home/golgor/torrent
thanks works great now
yeah, that program has its own user. Dunno if you want to allow write access to everyone
you helped me give it permission to write files right?
sure.
now it is drwxr-xrwx and i guess the last "-" is write directories?
first is the d, or - telling you if it is a file or a dir.
ahh, think i got it :P
but i got a similar problem then, if i got it right drwxr means permission to write/read/delete directories?
yea, but torrentflux dont have permission to create dirs in my /torrent
it seems
Error(s):# Couldn't allocate dir - [Errno 13]  Permission denied:
says the path has to be chmodded to 777
